author: Jonathan Tepper
title: When Our Hospitals Are the Pandemic Superspreaders
description:
They are more prone to transmission than the field facilities set up during the Spanish Flu of 1918. Here's why.
The post When Our Hospitals Are the Pandemic Superspreaders appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: They are more prone to transmission than the field facilities set up during the Spanish Flu of 1918. Here's why.Every disease has its patient zero, and for the coronavirus Covid-19, the press identified patient zero was Wei Guixian, a 57-year-old woman who wo… [+10502 chars]
